tool_description: Validates access policies and role configurations against security rules and compliance requirements to ensure proper RBAC implementation.

policy_data.description: JSON string containing policy configuration to validate

validation_rules.description: List of validation rules to apply

compliance_standard.description: Compliance standard to validate against: SOX, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, custom

strict_mode.description: Whether to apply strict validation rules

error_messages: Invalid policy data: Policy data must be valid JSON format.
Unknown validation rule: One or more validation rules are not recognized.
Invalid compliance standard: Use one of [SOX, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, custom].
Validation failed: Policy violates one or more specified rules.
usage: Provide policy_data as JSON string and specify validation_rules to check. Set compliance_standard and strict_mode as needed for thorough validation.
